Package scene

Class XMLtoScene

java.lang.Object
scene.XMLtoScene
public class XMLtoScene
extends java.lang.Object
this class is used to receive a XML file containing a scene details, and get them from the file to a scene instance

    static void AddPlanesToScene​(org.w3c.dom.NodeList planeNL)

    function to read an attribute contains color and extract the color in our primitives.Color format

    reads the xml file into scene

    • NodeToColor

      public static Color NodeToColor​(org.w3c.dom.Node node, java.lang.String attribute)
      function to read an attribute contains color and extract the color in our primitives.Color format
      Parameters:
      node - - the node which we want to extract from
      attribute - - the name of the wanted attribute we are looking for
      Returns:
      the color in the attribute in the node in primitives.Color format
